articles.title: Mystery around what killed tonnes of fish in Europe's Oder River continues as authories warn recovery will take years - ABC News
articles.description: As tests into the cause of the mass death of fish continue, Polish authorities announce a reward for information that helps find those responsible for polluting the river.
articles.content:
Laboratory tests after a mass die-off of fish in the Oder River has detected high levels of salinity but no mercury poisoning its waters.
